homeHeader.title: Private Kindergarten
homeHeader.tagline: The Best Place For The Development Of Your Child!

about.title: About
about.welcome: Welcome to our kindergarten, where every child is special and important. Our team of experienced educators is ready to be a reliable support for your family on the path to successful learning and development of abilities and talents. We strive to create a warm and cozy atmosphere where your child will feel at home. Open up a world of opportunities for your child with us!
list: Professional approach to development based on modern methodologies.
Comfortable and safe atmosphere, promoting optimal child development.
High-quality preschool preparing for successful entry into school.
Flexible working schedule adapted to the needs of modern parents.
Integrated approach to learning, considering the diversity of each child's needs.
Feedback system with parents for collaborative work on child development.
Access to modern materials for creative and intellectual development.
Psychological support for child adaptation and emotional resilience.
Positive feedback from satisfied parents and high recommendation.

playground.title: Playground
playground.description: Outdoor activities promote motor skills and social development.

music_and_dance.title: Music and Dance
music_and_dance.description: Activities that enhance children's musical abilities and coordination.

healthy_food.title: Healthy Food
healthy_food.description: Carefully selected food considering the needs of growing bodies.

arts_and_crafts.title: Arts and Crafts
arts_and_crafts.description: Activities that promote the development of creative abilities and imagination.

speech_therapy.title: Speech Therapy
speech_therapy.description: Working with a speech therapist to improve a child's speech.

morning_exercises.title: Morning Exercises
morning_exercises.description: Active exercises for an energetic start to the day. Exercises promote increased concentration during lessons.

developmental_lessons.title: Developmental Lessons
developmental_lessons.description: Activities aimed at developing intellect and creative abilities.

preschool_training.title: Preschool Training
preschool_training.description: Programs that help children prepare for school learning. We teach basic reading, writing, and mathematics skills.

english_lessons.title: English Lessons
english_lessons.description: Lessons with a teacher to master a foreign language, opening up new opportunities for the future.

sunbeam.title: Sunbeam
sunbeam.description: A specially adapted program that takes into account the developmental characteristics of the youngest children. The emphasis is on stimulating speech and motor skills through various games and exercises. Attention is paid to the development of social skills, self-care skills, and basic safety.

rainbow.title: Rainbow
rainbow.description: A group where the main focus is on socialization and emotional development of the child. Sessions are aimed at interaction with peers, developing communicative abilities, and learning conflict resolution skills. Various creative games are used to stimulate imagination and creativity.

bell.title: Bell
bell.description: A group that prepares children for school, taking into account their needs and level of development. The main emphasis is on learning basic reading, writing, and mathematics skills. Interactive teaching methods are used to engage children in the learning process and enhance their motivation.

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.tagline: Check out Photos of Your Children

feedback.title: Our Users Feedback
feedback.tagline: Сheck Out The Comments Of Our Parents

location.title: Our Location
location.info1: We are located in the very center of the wonderful city of Kharkiv, in a cozy and safe area at 14 Nauki Avenue. Our convenient location ensures easy access to the kindergarten from any part of the city, both for local residents and those living outside the city limits.
location.info2: Our premises are equipped to modern standards of safety and comfort. The kindergarten has a fully equipped bomb shelter, providing peace of mind and confidence to parents in their choice for the education and development of their children.
location.info3: We strive to create not only a place for learning and development, but also a friendly and cozy environment for your child. Our team of experienced and caring educators is ready to provide your little one with quality pedagogical support and a positive atmosphere.
location.info4: We invite you to visit us at 14 Nauki Avenue, where your child can unleash their potential and enjoy a happy childhood in our friendly community.
